comments.body: **MUST Join Telegram Xircus - https://t.me/XircusWEB3 BountyPortals - https://t.me/Officialbountyportal Tokens DistributionWe're excited to share that BountyPortals has taken over the Xircus Bounty Campaign. The previous campaign, Bounty 2.0, was ended due to the reputation issues of the previous Bounty Manager. However, the Xircus team has decided to re-hire our BountyPortals team to review the work of Bounty 2.0 participants and distribute stakes accordingly. We aim to complete the token allocation process within a few weeks and send them to the Xircus team. If you participated in Bounty 2.0, please join our Telegram group.The distribution of Bounty 2.0 and Bounty 3.0 will take place once after the TGE.Previously, Xircus successfully launched Bounty 1.0 with BountyPortals and paid the hunters. If you participated in Bounty 1.0, you can migrate your previous tokens to the current contract address.Hashtags @XircusWEB3 #XircusWEB3  #nft #web3 #BUIDL #Cryptocurrency #NFTMarketplace #DeFi  #blockchain #dApps
